short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your tabs, work more efficiently.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tab manager for chrome that allows you to work clutter-free.
Name your tabs, according to your needs - be as creative as you want.
Dynamically change the tab's icon - each icon represents a different importance level.
Sort all of your tabs with a single keystroke - in order of importance.
